channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Halloween Baking Championship
channel.desc: There are tricks and treats in this sister show to the seasonal "Holiday Baking Championship." Bakers are tasked with creating spooky treats in Halloween-themed challenges. As the competition heats up, judges - who have included Lorraine Pascale, Stephanie Boswell, Carla Hall and Zac Young - eliminate contestants. The best keep moving through rounds as the tasks and challenges become more complicated. The champion of the "Main Heat" gets a $25,000 prize and the prestige of being declared winner of the season's creepiest cooking contest.
